octavia_load_balancer_listeners_descript: Each Load Balancer receives traffic on one or more listeners. Each listener has a distinct port/protocol pair.
This interface offers the most used options. Additional options are available via Horizon.
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_default_: The default pool is used for L3/L4 load balancing.
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_protocol: The protocol on which the front end listens for connections.
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_port_hel: The protocol on which the front end listens. The port must be between 1 and 65535
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_create_s: New {{ listener }} listener has been created!
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_edit_suc: New {{ listener }} listener has been updated!
octavia_load_balancer_listener_delete_su: Your {{ listener }} listener has been deleted.
octavia_load_balancer_listeners_policies: L7 policy management is only available for listeners using the HTTP and TERMINATED HTTPS protocols
